text: Władysław "Wladek" Szpilman (; 5 December 19116 July 2000) was a Polish pianist and classical composer. Szpilman is known as the main character of the Roman Polanski movie The Pianist (2002). This movie is based on the book of the same name. It recounts Polanski's survival of the German occupation of Warsaw and the Holocaust.
